text: The year 2014 was the 5th year in the history of the Road Fighting Championship, an MMA promotion based in South Korea. 2014 started with Road FC Korea 001 and ended with Road FC 020. == List of events == {| class="sortable wikitable succession-box" style="margin:1.0em auto; font-size:80%;" !
